description: Hi guys my name is Kavit and in this course we will learn to program using Ruby a popular object-oriented programming language. To begin with we will examine the basic object types in Ruby as well as fundamentals of the language syntax. We will learn how an object-oriented programming works and I will walk you through the steps that enable us to read and write to a file in your code. Finally at the end of the course I will ask to perform a simple program to find prime, even and odd numbers between a range of values and you will have to use File handling syntax to get the starting and ending values of the range. Now it doesn't matter if you are a beginner and you don't have prior experience we will all the fundamentals you need. And if you are interested in web-development you will end up having basic knowledge of Ruby that will help you use it in making websites using Ruby on Rails.
title: Learn to code in Ruby from Scratch in less than 1 Hour
